snippet: We use computer projections to bring you the likely results if New York City rather than London had been awarded the 2012 Olympic Games.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger humorously imagines what it would be like if New York City, rather than London, had won the bid for the 2012 Olympic Games.
lead_paragraph: We use computer projections to bring you the likely results if New York City rather than London had been awarded the 2012 Olympic Games.

headline.seo: Imagining the 2012 Olympic Games in New York
